org.seedstack.seed.security

Interface RoleMapping


  • public interface RoleMapping
    Interface used to define a mapping between the data coming from a realm and the roles given to the user. The realm gives all the data so the RoleMapping can apply rules considering them.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection<Role> resolveRoles(Set<String> realmData, Collection<PrincipalProvider<?>> principalProviders)
      Resolve the Roles from the given data.

    • Method Detail

      • resolveRoles

        Collection<Role> resolveRoles(Set<String> realmData,
                              Collection<PrincipalProvider<?>> principalProviders)
        Resolve the Roles from the given data.

        The RoleMapping can have its own rules whether or not to give a Role. These rules can be based on the given PrincipalProviders.

        The principalProviders collection is not null but the principal you may look for might not be present.

        Parameters:
        realmData - the authorization data coming from the realm as a set of String. Not null.
        principalProviders - the principalProviders coming from the Realm of this. Not null
        Returns:
        A collection of the Roles resolved from the data. Not null.
        See Also:
        for utility methods to extract principalProviders from a collection.
